title: Parking rage turns bloody at Cheras flats after man slashed
desc: KUALA LUMPUR, Feb 22 — A parking dispute at the Seri Melaka Flats in Cheras escalated into a knife attack this week, leaving a man with a three-centimetre wound on his left...

title: Gordon Ramsay's ex-mistress accuses him of whitewashing his past in his 'completely misleading and fake' new Netflix series
desc: The six-part Netflix documentary series Being Gordon Ramsay highlights a softer, more vulnerable, side of the multi-millionaire restaurateur - as a devoted husband and father of six.

title: Missiles pound Kyiv and other regions ahead of Russia invasion anniversary
desc: The city has faced waves of overnight strikes recently as Moscow intensified its assaults on infrastructure.

title: PM Modi flags off Namo Bharat RRTS, Meerut Metro | Video
desc: The project, consisting of both the Namo Bharat RRTS and the Meerut Metro, was developed at an estimated cost of ₹30,274 crore.| India News

title: El Al Flight Delayed at LAX After 140 Suitcases Flagged in Explosive Security Sweep
desc: El Al LY-6 delayed at LAX over 'Free Palestine' stickers on 140 bags, triggering explosive searches; Shin Bet security and global disputes.

title: Los Angeles Football Club
desc:
Los Angeles Football Club (LAFC) began its 2026 MLS regular season with a 3-0 win over Inter Miami CF in the second-highest attended game in MLS history, and the highest attended opening weekend game in league annals.

title: Super Rugby giants collide as ACT Brumbies face Crusaders
desc: Pundits had written the ACT Brumbies off as they arrived chasing their first win over the Crusaders in Christchurch since 2000.

title: Ministry sec-gen among several witnesses to be called in probe over RM1.1bil agreement
desc: KUALA LUMPUR: The Malaysian Anti-Corruption Commission (MACC) is expected to call several witnesses, including the secretary-general of a ministry, to assist in investigations into the implementation of a RM1.1bil agreement between the Malaysian Government and a foreign company.

title: MACC to summon economy ministry sec-gen in RM1bil deal probe
desc: The deal was alleged to have been pushed through hastily despite not having the agreement of the finance ministry and Miti.

title: 'He is so complete' - Pep Guardiola in awe of Man City star Nico O'Reilly after Newcastle brace
desc: Pep Guardiola has showered Manchester City starlet Nico O’Reilly with praise, claiming that the versatile 20-year-old is so complete. The youngster, who had just nine senior career goals to his name prior to facing Newcastle at the Etihad Stadium, bagged a brace in his latest Premier League experience to fire City to within two points of table-topping Arsenal.
